data.name: In The Shadow
data.detailed_description:
Steam Video

This content is only available in an online streaming format. More information about streaming videos can be found in the https://support.steampowered.com/kb_article.php?ref=8699-OASD-1871">Streaming Videos on Steam FAQ.


About the Video

Directed by: Nicole Elmer
Written by: Nicole Elmer, Jorge Sermini, Jason Termblay
Starrring: Jorge Sermini, Michelle Keffer, Danny Trejo

Exhausted from the demands of his gift as a healer, Diego lives in isolation in Puerto Rico. However, his life is disrupted when Hilary, a filmmaker, arrives. Intrigued by Diego's mystery, she tries to get closer. As the two become attracted to each other, Hilary discovers Diego’s “gift” comes with a violent curse that changes their lives.
data.about_the_game:
Directed by: Nicole Elmer
Written by: Nicole Elmer, Jorge Sermini, Jason Termblay
Starrring: Jorge Sermini, Michelle Keffer, Danny Trejo

Exhausted from the demands of his gift as a healer, Diego lives in isolation in Puerto Rico. However, his life is disrupted when Hilary, a filmmaker, arrives. Intrigued by Diego's mystery, she tries to get closer. As the two become attracted to each other, Hilary discovers Diego’s “gift” comes with a violent curse that changes their lives.
data.short_description: A healer is tormented by the dark side of his "gift.
data.reviews:
“It's a dazzlingly sunlit nightmare, as poetic as it is disturbing.”
The Austin Chronicle

“...stands out in a world of cookie cutter films.”
Rogue Cinema

“... a unique blend of drama, horror and surrealism”
Austin Vida

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Network Bandwidth of 5Mbps for 540p, 3Mbps for 360p.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core I3+ or AMD equivalent recommended for HD 1080p playback
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Network Bandwidth of 12Mbps for 1080p or 8Mbps for 720p.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OSX 10.7
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Network Bandwidth of 5Mbps for 540p, 3Mbps for 360p.
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Mac OSX 10.10+
  • Processor: Intel Core I3+ or AMD equivalent recommended for HD 1080p playback
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Network Bandwidth of 12Mbps for 1080p or 8Mbps for 720p.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Linux Ubuntu 12.04 or later, SteamOS 2.20 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Network Bandwidth of 5Mbps for 540p, 3Mbps for 360p.

  • Processor: Intel Core I3+ or AMD equivalent recommended for HD 1080p playback
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection

  • Additional Notes: Network Bandwidth of 12Mbps for 1080p or 8Mbps for 720p.
